page.title: 20V.E.Day,1945,Cortachy
page.content:
As in other towns and villages throughout Britain,Cortachy celebrated the end of the war.A bonfire was lit on Monument Hill and in the field opposite the school sports were held. Ice-cream and other refreshments were served and everyone enjoyed a holiday.
Credits
This data was compiled by the pupils of Primaries 5,6 and 7 of Cortachy Primary School,Kirriemuir,Angus with the help of their teacher,the factor of Airlie Estates and several of the local inhabitants. This record of life,past and present in and around Cortachy was completed on June 24th,1985.
